":{"primary":{"id":"primary","trigger":{"type":"primary"},"name":"primary","applicability":"","description":"","nodes":{"4713f24742ea4ea8a531926ef688bdcc":{"id":"4713f24742ea4ea8a531926ef688bdcc","stepType":"Start","name":"Start","greetingResponse":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"mode":"query","value":""}},"f33b5ec214b148bf84e5ec0077fd39a3":{"id":"f33b5ec214b148bf84e5ec0077fd39a3","stepType":"TerminateGoal","name":"End","confirmationMessage":{"mode":"simple","value":""},"applicability":{"mode":"query","value":""}},"7c1637616aae43c9ac78f8bc28d87b17":{"id":"7c1637616aae43c9ac78f8bc28d87b17","stepType":"ReusableTopic","name":"Search Catalog Item","fields":[],"reusableTopicChoice":"Search Catalog Item","reusableTopicId":"ccaacd71c3a3330012d1758a7ff57ecd","inputs":{"catalogs":{"value":"(function execute() {
 function getCatalogM2M(portalId) {
 var gr = new GlideRecord('m2m_sp_portal_catalog');
 if (gr.isValid()) {
 gr.addActiveQuery();
 gr.addQuery('sp_portal', portalId);
 gr.addQuery('sc_catalog.active', true);
 gr.orderBy('order');
 gr.orderBy('sc_catalog.active');
 }
 else {
 gr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
 gr.addQuery('sys_id', portalId);
 }
 gr.setWorkflow(false)
 gr.query();
 return gr;
 }
 var suffix = vaVars.portalName;
 if (suffix) {
 var catalogs = "";
 var gr = new GlideRecord('sp_portal');
 gr.addQuery('url_suffix', suffix);
 gr.setWorkflow(false)
 gr.query();
 gr.next();
 var portalId = gr.getUniqueValue();
 vaVars.portalId = portalId;
 var m2mGR = getCatalogM2M(portalId);
 if (m2mGR.getRowCount() > 0) {
 m2mGR.next();
 catalogs += m2mGR.getValue('sc_catalog');
 while (m2mGR.next()) {
 catalogs += ',';
 catalogs += m2mGR.getValue('sc_catalog')

 }
 }
 return catalogs;
 }
 return '';
})()
","mode":"script","type":"String"},"query_term":{"value":"(function execute() {
 if (vaVars.search_catalogitem != '' && !vaVars.search_again)
 return vaVars.search_catalogitem

 if (vaVars.search_hardware != '')
 return vaVars.search_hardware
 else if (vaVars.search_software != '')
 return vaVars.search_software
 else if (vaInputs.search != '')
 return vaInputs.search

})()

"},"loading":false,"useTemplateTopic":false},"d0fb990cf1a64a038bb9a0bf07d945c8":{"id":"d0fb990cf1a64a038bb9a0bf07d945c8","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"0d7e2a450d5048cb8904473c393060a6":{"id":"0d7e2a450d5048cb8904473c393060a6","stepType":"TextOutput","name":"Try Again","value":[{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"OK, let's try again."}]}],"mode":"simple"}],"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false,"requestFeedback":true},"f0c543b0b8304a6b96a2ac231733ebd0":{"id":"f0c543b0b8304a6b96a2ac231733ebd0","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"e29a6b3d5d604649b1942a980ef9924c":{"id":"e29a6b3d5d604649b1942a980ef9924c","stepType":"LinkOutput","name":"Link Output","url":{"value":"(function execute() {
 var item = new sn_sc.CatItem(vaInputs.catalog_item_id);

 if (item && item.getRecordClass() === "sc_cat_item_guide")
 return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + '?id=sc_cat_item_guide&sys_id=' + vaInputs.catalog_item_id + '&referrer=va';
 
 return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + '?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=' + vaInputs.catalog_item_id + '&referrer=va';
})()","mode":"script"},"label":{"value":"(function execute() {
 var item = new sn_sc.CatItem(vaInputs.catalog_item_id);
 if (item) {
 var catItemJson = item.read({
 'name' : ''
 }, false);
 return catItemJson.name || '';
 }
 return '';
})()
","mode":"script"},"header":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Use the link below to submit your request:"}]}],"mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 /* Return true or false to indicate if the topic or topic node can run
 and be discoverable (or not). For example:

 var applicability = vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill' ? true : false;
 return applicability;
 */
 return vaInputs.catalog_item_id != '-1';
})()

"},"inputs":{"deflection_configuration":{"value":"5292005253213010000dddeeff7b126c","mode":"string","type":"Reference","table":"ssa_deflection_configuration"},"deflection_pattern":{"value":"6eb34c5253213010000dddeeff7b12be","mode":"string","type":"Reference","table":"ssa_deflection_pattern"},"activity_table":{"value":"","mode":"simple","type":"String"},"activity_ids":{"value":"","mode":"simple","type":"String"}},"outputs":[],"outdatedNote":false,"variableIds":[]},"bf098ed0f9ae400396ef7c51226292e9":{"id":"bf098ed0f9ae400396ef7c51226292e9","name":"Set search term","script":"(function execute() {

 vaVars.search = vaInputs.search.toString();
 vaVars.search_catalogitem = vaInputs.search_catalogitem;
 vaVars.search_hardware = vaInputs.search_hardware;
 vaVars.search_software = vaInputs.search_software;

 if (vaInputs.search != ''){
 vaVars.direct_search = true;
 return;
 }
 

 if (vaContext.getRequesterLang() == 'en') {
 var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
 gr.addActiveQuery();
 gr.addQuery('name', vaInputs.search_catalogitem);
 gr.query();

 while (gr.next()) {
 vaVars.catalog_item_id = gr.getValue('sys_id');
 vaInputs.catalog_item_id = vaVars.catalog_item_id;
 }
 
 } else {

 var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_translated_text');
 
 gr.addQuery('value', vaInputs.search_catalogitem);
 gr.addQuery('tablename', 'sc_cat_item');
 gr.addQuery('language', vaContext.getRequesterLang())
 gr.addQuery('fieldname', 'name')
 gr.query();

 while (gr.next()) {
 var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
 gr2.addActiveQuery();
 gr2.addQuery('sys_id', gr.getValue('documentkey'));
 gr2.query();
 if (gr2.next()) {
 vaVars.catalog_item_id = gr.getValue('documentkey');
 vaInputs.catalog_item_id = vaVars.catalog_item_id;
 }
 }
 }

 if (vaVars.search_catalogitem != null) {
 if (vaVars.search_hardware == '' && vaVars.search_software == '')
 vaVars.hardware_software_entity_mapped = false;

 else
 vaVars.hardware_software_entity_mapped = true;
 }
})()
","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"mode":"query","value":""}},"bc9ba58327d44c1db2f720d51cc4aabc":{"id":"bc9ba58327d44c1db2f720d51cc4aabc","stepType":"ScriptOutput","name":"Submitted Request Record","output_type":"single_part","script":"(function execute() {
 
 var title = '';
 var subtitle = '';
 var fields = [];

 var gr = new GlideRecord(vaVars.record_table);
 gr.addQuery('sys_id',vaVars.record_id);
 gr.query();
 title = gr.getClassDisplayValue();
 if(gr.next()){
 subtitle = gr.getValue('task_effective_number').toString();
 if (gr.isValidField('short_description')) {
 fields.push({
 "fieldLabel": gr.getElement('short_description').getLabel(),
 "fieldValue": gr.getDisplayValue('short_description').toString()
 });
 }
 if (gr.isValidField('state')) {
 fields.push({
 "fieldLabel": gr.getElement('state').getLabel(),
 "fieldValue": gr.getDisplayValue('state').toString()
 });
 }
 }
 
 var card_data = JSON.stringify({
 "title":title,
 "subtitle":subtitle,
 "fields":fields,
 "url":vaVars.recordLink.toString()
 });
 return vaSystem.renderCard("Card", card_data); 
})()
","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"3fd906568f8a4f60bbe4d1be35e2d5e7":{"id":"3fd906568f8a4f60bbe4d1be35e2d5e7","name":"Check if Item is supported by VA?","script":"(function execute() {
 vaVars.catalog_item_id = vaInputs.catalog_item_id;
 vaVars.is_conversational = new sn_sc.CatalogConversationHelper().hasVASupport(vaVars.catalog_item_id.toString());
 vaInputs.is_conversational = vaVars.is_conversational;
})()

","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"171024943fcd4a74b2842e8877b69dd9":{"id":"171024943fcd4a74b2842e8877b69dd9","stepType":"Decision","name":"Query search?"},"a78129bc8d5a485cae791500216950dc":{"id":"a78129bc8d5a485cae791500216950dc","name":"Get Catalog item details","script":"(function execute() {
 
 var catItemObj = new sn_sc.CatItem(vaVars.catalog_item_id);
 var catItemJson = catItemObj.getItemSummary(false, 'basic');
 vaVars.image = catItemJson.picture;
 vaVars.item_title = catItemJson.name;

 var itemJSON = new sn_sc.CatalogConversationHelper().getItem(vaVars.catalog_item_id);
 vaVars.itemJSON = JSON.stringify(itemJSON);
})()
","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 /* Return true or false to indicate if the topic or topic node can run
 and be discoverable (or not). For example:

 return applicability;
 */
 return vaVars.catalog_item_id != '' || vaInputs.catalog_item_id != '';
})()
"}},"dd746af211d64594ac31556adb7c1342":{"id":"dd746af211d64594ac31556adb7c1342","stepType":"TextOutput","name":"Description","secure":false,"value":[{"value":"(function execute() {

})()
","mode":"script"}],"applicability":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {

","mode":"script"}],"applicability":{"mode":"query","value":""},"requestFeedback":true},"f7e5aebfa4ed445cbfeeebfe580e5b6d":{"id":"f7e5aebfa4ed445cbfeeebfe580e5b6d","stepType":"ImageOutput","name":"Image","url":{"value":"(function execute() {
 /* Return a quoted string. For example:

 if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {
 return gs.getMessageLang("hi there {0}", vaContext.getRequesterLang(), [vaInputs.first_name]);
 } else {
 return gs.getMessageLang("how are you {0}", vaContext.getRequesterLang(), [vaInputs.last_name]);
 }
 */
 return vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.image;
})()

"}},"22eaec0090dd481a930d6c21f2e87e83":{"id":"22eaec0090dd481a930d6c21f2e87e83","name":"Set catalog item variables","script":"(function execute() {
 if(vaInputs.catalog_item_id == null && vaVars.catalog_item_id != null)
 vaInputs.catalog_item_id = vaVars.catalog_item_id;
 else if(vaVars.catalog_item_id == null && vaInputs.catalog_item_id != null)
 vaVars.catalog_item_id = vaInputs.catalog_item_id;
})()
","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"771d233d8c5049f6b6146f3ab5df23c8":{"id":"771d233d8c5049f6b6146f3ab5df23c8","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"dc2ac7e4f2684b0ab91c9b9115ba9f01":{"id":"dc2ac7e4f2684b0ab91c9b9115ba9f01","name":"Process end state details","script":"(function execute() {
 var tableName = vaInputs.record_table.toString();
 var recordId = vaInputs.record_id.toString();

 vaVars.record_table = tableName;
 vaVars.record_id = recordId;

 var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
 gr.addQuery('sys_id', recordId);
 gr.query();

 if (gr.next()) {
 vaVars.isTaskBasedTable = !!(gr.parent != null && gr.parent.getTableName() == 'task')
 }


 var pageId = 'form';
 if (vaVars.isTaskBasedTable)
 pageId = 'ticket';

 var link = '';
 var screenId = '';
 if (vaVars.portalName === 'mesp') {
 var mobileDLink = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator('request');
 if (tableName == 'sc_req_item')
 screenId = '7516f9d787232300e0ef0cf888cb0b4d';
 else if (tableName == 'sc_request')
 screenId = '276dd3edb79033001befcd58de11a9c7';
 else if (tableName == 'incident')
 screenId = 'ebb94d9c0f2033001befa68ca8767e4e';
 else
 screenId = 'd39eb2db87772300e0ef0cf888cb0bcb';

 link = mobileDLink.getFormScreenLink(screenId, tableName, recordId);
 } else
 link = vaVars.baseUri + vaVars.portalName + "?id=" + pageId + "&table=" + tableName + "&sys_id=" + recordId;

 vaVars.recordLink = link;
})()
","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"6a2a6432961a4413adf9dde573253b9d":{"id":"6a2a6432961a4413adf9dde573253b9d","stepType":"Decision","name":"Decision"},"d62ce0a4359b4d918b3dbcf4eddf21a1":{"id":"d62ce0a4359b4d918b3dbcf4eddf21a1","stepType":"LinkOutput","name":"Submitted record link","url":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":""},{"type":"datapill","dataPill":{"value":"{{vaVars.recordLink}}","displayValue":"Script Variables➛recordLink"},"children":[{"text":""}]},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"},"label":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Click here to view the created record"}]}],"mode":"simple"},"header":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Your request has been submitted"}]}],"mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"linkType":"single","introMsg":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"listOfLinks":""},"923c3b21e0c14ebe9dbe2277fa91423b":{"id":"923c3b21e0c14ebe9dbe2277fa91423b","stepType":"ImageOutput","name":"Image","url":{"value":"(function execute() {

})()

"},"label":"Yes"},{"id":"d84fa88623d14b2192a7d5f68e815261","edgeType":"Edge","source":"dd746af211d64594ac31556adb7c1342","target":"e29a6b3d5d604649b1942a980ef9924c","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"f254ae938cde4e39a50dcccc2defce60","edgeType":"Edge","source":"d626c1b01e074b5092563170641f55b6","target":"7be48cdd80d94acabc87b5181bf6df98","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"b27b87d9bd9d46a89de9c60296717da2","edgeType":"Edge","source":"7c1637616aae43c9ac78f8bc28d87b17","target":"22eaec0090dd481a930d6c21f2e87e83","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"84d517c6fa0046779ef9b6465270ecaa","edgeType":"Branch","source":"771d233d8c5049f6b6146f3ab5df23c8","target":"d04b2cc9cf924c83a176d13e18af7a17","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
